mapper.select: SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT CMID, USERID, PROJECTID, CONTENT, NVL(RATING, 0) AS rating, CREATEDAT, CODE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE PROJECTID = #{projectId} AND TRIM(CODE) = #{code} ORDER BY CREATEDAT DESC ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN (#{pager.page} - 1) * #{pager.size} + 1 AND (#{pager.page} * #{pager.size})
